items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: Utility Belt is a versatile and lightweight collection of essential JavaScript utilities designed to streamline and simplify my development workflow
items.title: Castlenine/utility-belt: Utility Belt is a versatile and lightweight collection of essential JavaScript utilities designed to streamline and simplify my development workflow

items.content_html: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
items.title: mini-360/LinkShortner: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript utility library designed for running local language models (LLMs) like Gemma 2B directly on edge devices. This project aims to provide developers with easy-to-use tools for integrating AI capabilities into web applications without relying on external servers.

This project aims to provide developers with easy-to-use tools for integrating AI capabilities into web applications without relying on external servers.
